title: Fedora Asahi Remix to Empower Apple Silicon Users
description:
Get ready to embrace a harmonious blend of Linux and Apple’s hardware prowess in the soon-to-be-released Fedora Asahi Remix.

The post Fedora Asahi Remix to Empower Apple Silicon Users appeared first on Linux Today.

title: LMDE 6 ‘Faye,’ Aims for a Debian 12 Bookworm Base
description:
LMDE 6 will include all the new features and changes in Linux Mint 21.2 “Victoria” but with a Debian base rather than an Ubuntu base.

The post LMDE 6 ‘Faye,’ Aims for a Debian 12 Bookworm Base appeared first on Linux Today.

title: PCLinuxOS 2023.07 Brings Latest Plasma, MATE, Xfce Desktops
description:
Powered by Linux kernel 6.4.7, the rolling release distro PCLinuxOS 2023.07 ships with an updated software stack. Here’s what’s new!

The post PCLinuxOS 2023.07 Brings Latest Plasma, MATE, Xfce Desktops appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Thunderbird 115.1 Improves Flatpak Support, Hides Quick Filter Bar
description:
Thunderbird 115.1 hides the Quick Filter bar by default and adjusts the heights of the Mail tab toolbar and Unified toolbar to be more consistent. Learn more here.

The post Thunderbird 115.1 Improves Flatpak Support, Hides Quick Filter Bar appeared first on Linux Today.

title: The Next Evolution of Thunderbird: Sync Feature on the Horizon
description:
Thunderbird devs have announced they are working on new functionality, which will allow users to sync data across multiple app installations.

The post The Next Evolution of Thunderbird: Sync Feature on the Horizon appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Mozilla Firefox 117 to Introduce Automatic Translation Feature
description:
Firefox 117 plans to implement a built-in “Translate page” option in the application menu, which will automatically translate web content.

The post Mozilla Firefox 117 to Introduce Automatic Translation Feature appeared first on Linux Today.
